message.content:
cs.CR, cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.SY 

The paper deals with security policies and their enforcement in a computational model, which is a common topic in the computer security (cs.CR) and programming languages (cs.PL) communities. The use of automata and semantic interpretations also suggests a possible connection to formal methods (cs.LO) and software engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the application of the theory to a capability system suggests a possible connection to systems and control (cs.SY).
